**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T02:02:48Z" title="04/26/2015 02:02  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by KristopherKerblumbus**
  
Adding craft files
I love the blueprints! How do you make those :OOO

Yes very impressive KristopherKerblumbus. Those blue print pics are cool.

Also I had no idea there were wind turbines for KSP ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Hey, thanks guys! ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png) Glad you like the crafts. So, the wind turbines come from LackLusterLabs, they're not stock, but a lot of fun to use! And the blueprint pics are partially GIMP, and partially Kronal Vessel Viewer (found here: [http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224287-kronal-vessel-viewer-kvv-exploded-ship-view](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224287-kronal-vessel-viewer-kvv-exploded-ship-view)). The KVV mod only gives you the images, though. To make things look like a blueprint, like I said, just export it into GIMP or Photoshop or your image editor of choice and go to town!
Some awesome-looking ships in this thread! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
